channel.title: Will pay $5 to the first person that can solve this
channel.description:
If you solve this pm your paypal e-mail and I'll send the $5 right away
Run.bat code for server
[code]@echo off title SoulSplit java -Xmx512m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause[/code]
Server error
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/14kz95.png[/img]
Run.bat client code
[code]@echo off title Client cd java -Xms512m -Xmx624m Launcher pause [/code]
Client error
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/28vwrv8.png[/img]

item.title: Will pay $5 to the first person that can solve this
item.dc:creator: @Bellend Bellend
item.description:
@Bellend wrote:

Major minor error means that:

the files have already been compiled with a new/old version of java compared to yours

compile the files with the same jdk version of your java

e.g java7 - jdk7
java6 - jdk6 and so on

Read full topic
item.source: Will pay $5 to the first person that can solve this

item.title: Will pay $5 to the first person that can solve this
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

Thats because your path is still pointing to the Java you were using in the first place,

replace java with “java/directory/here” or change your environmental variables to Java 7

Read full topic
item.source: Will pay $5 to the first person that can solve this

item.title: Will pay $5 to the first person that can solve this
item.dc:creator: @zRickyz zRickyz
item.description:
@zRickyz wrote:

Had no problems with the server, it’s just the client right now. I’ve tried JDK 1.6.0_31 1.7.0 and 1.7.0_03 none of them worked with this code in the run.bat

@echo off title Client cd java -Xms512m -Xmx624m Launcher pause

If it makes a difference I have Windows 7

Read full topic
item.source: Will pay $5 to the first person that can solve this

item.title: Will pay $5 to the first person that can solve this
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

Wait, I know your issue with the 1.7.0_03,

You tried using this code didn’t you?

@echo off
title SoulSplit
java -Xmx512m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server
pause

Read full topic
item.source: Will pay $5 to the first person that can solve this

item.title: Will pay $5 to the first person that can solve this

@zRickyz wrote:

It started loading it but then gave me the original error I had, I tried JDK 1.7.0_03 and that didn’t work so I just downloaded 1.7 which was the orignal code in the run.bat. wish me luck! and thanks for your help

item.title: Will pay $5 to the first person that can solve this
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

Your trying to run a lower version of Java on files that were compiled with a higher Java. Either compile with a lower Java, or update yours:
http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/index.html

Read full topic
item.source: Will pay $5 to the first person that can solve this

if not, and you have a higher version of jdk compile with that
